title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Tenant Allow/Block List domain & addresses block to send inbound emails to admin quarantine
description: Today, incoming messages from domains or email addresses blocked by the Tenant Allow/Block List are treated as high-confidence spam (marked with SCL:9), which may not properly protect end users. With this change, messages from these blocked senders will be treated as high-confidence phish, and will be delivered to the admin quarantine.
